framework.events

Interface MouseControl

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, Picture, Rectangle, Square, Triangle

    public interface MouseControl
extends MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener
    The Class MouseControl is a listener for mouse-buttons, mouse-motions and mouse-wheel events.
    Author:
    Hans Ferchland
    See Also:
    MouseListener, MouseWheelListener, MouseMotionListener
